title: Whereas Robert Brown vicar of Castle-Lyons, Oliver Parr, Henry Parr, Edward Morly, Dennis Kearny, and John Patt, petitioned us in behalf of themselves, and several other inhabitants of the town of Castle-Lyons in the county of Cork, setting forth that on Wednesday the eleventh of June last, 1662 there hapned in the town of Castle-Lyons a sudden and violent fire ... by the Lords Justices and Council, Mau. Eustace, canc., Orrery.
author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
notes: Title from first 6 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council chamber in Dublin, the 16th day of July, 1662."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
